original_title: The Killer That Stalked New York
overview: In New York, Sheila Bennet and her spouse, Matt Krane, are trying to unload a trove of rare jewels they smuggled into America from Cuba, but the police are hot on the couple's trail. Meanwhile, government officials begin a desperate search for an unknown individual who is infecting the city with smallpox.
tagline: One Woman Brings Terror to 8,000,000 People!
title: The Killer That Stalked New York
